movie.title: Small Town Christmas
movie.description_intro: Book tour takes Christmas bestseller author to the hometown of the man who inspired her to write the book, but also hurt her feelings by standing her up.
movie.description_full: Book tour takes Christmas bestseller author to the hometown of the man who inspired her to write the book, but also hurt her feelings by standing her up.

movies.title: Battle Royale II
movies.summary: Three years after the events in "Battle Royale," Shuya Nanahara (Tatsuya Fujiwara)is a well-known terrorist bent on bringing down the government. In response, they order the creation of the "Battle Royale 2" program, and send a class of junior-high students to catch and kill him.
movies.description_full: Three years after the events in "Battle Royale," Shuya Nanahara (Tatsuya Fujiwara)is a well-known terrorist bent on bringing down the government. In response, they order the creation of the "Battle Royale 2" program, and send a class of junior-high students to catch and kill him.
movies.synopsis: Three years after the events in "Battle Royale," Shuya Nanahara (Tatsuya Fujiwara)is a well-known terrorist bent on bringing down the government. In response, they order the creation of the "Battle Royale 2" program, and send a class of junior-high students to catch and kill him.

movies.title: Sector 4: Extraction
movies.summary: While on a top-secret mission in Sector 4, the most dangerous area of the Middle East, a team of Private Military Contractors known as Black Knight are ambushed and taken hostage. Team leader Nash Olsen (Olivier Gruner) escapes captivity and is rescued by the U.S. government, only to discover by Black Knight Commander (Eric Roberts) that a rescue mission is impossible. Forced to choose between his family or upholding the Black Knight motto "No One Left Behind," Nash begins a one-man rescue attempt to save his team, discovering there may be more to this mission than he thinks.

movies.title: Foxbat
movies.summary: In Hong Kong, a Chinese cook swallows a microfilm by accident and becomes a target.
movies.description_full: In Hong Kong, a Chinese cook swallows a microfilm by accident and becomes a target.
movies.synopsis: In Hong Kong, a Chinese cook swallows a microfilm by accident and becomes a target.

movies.title: Drive Me Crazy
movies.summary: Nicole (Melissa Joan Hart) and Chase (Adrian Grenier) are neighbors but are from two very different worlds. Despite their differences their love lives have a common theme. Their most recent plans for love have fallen through putting them both in a desperate state to fix them. Both Nicole and Chase conspire to pretend to find a romantic interest in each other, with the hopes of attracting the "ones who got away" from them. Leading up to the big school dance, Chase and Nicole find that their scam worked out better than they had planned.
